trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet
Disable-computerrestore
Disable-computerrestore
简述

trans-unit.source: Disables the System Restore feature on the specified file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的文件系统驱动器上禁用系统还原功能。
语法
说明

trans-unit.source: The **Disable-ComputerRestore** cmdlet turns off the System Restore feature on one or more file system drives.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-computerrestore** cmdlet 将关闭一个或多个文件系统驱动器上的系统还原功能。

trans-unit.source: As a result, attempts to restore the computer do not affect the specified drive.
trans-unit.target: 因此，尝试还原计算机不会影响指定的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: To disable System Restore on any drive, it must be disabled on the system drive, either first or concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 若要在任何驱动器上禁用系统还原，则必须首先或并行在系统驱动器上禁用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: To re-enable System Restore, use the Enable-ComputerRestore cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新启用系统还原，请使用 Enable-ComputerRestore cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To find the state of System Restore for each drive, use Rstrui.exe.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找每个驱动器的系统还原状态，请使用 Rstrui.exe。

trans-unit.source: System restore points and the ComputerRestore cmdlets are supported only on client operating systems, such as Windows 7, Windows Vista, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 系统还原点和 ComputerRestore cmdlet 仅在客户端操作系统（例如 Windows 7、Windows Vista 和 Windows XP）上受支持。
示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Disable System Restore on the specified drive
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 指定的驱动器上禁用系统还原

trans-unit.source: This command disables System Restore on the C: drive.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将在 C: 驱动器上禁用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Disable System Restore on multiple drives
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 多个驱动器上禁用系统还原

trans-unit.source: This command disables System Restore on the C: and D: drives.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将在 C: 和 D: 驱动器上禁用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Drive* parameter, but it omits the Drive parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 *驱动器* 参数，但它忽略了驱动器参数名。
参数
-Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。
-驱动器
指定文件系统驱动器。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more file system drive letters, each followed by a colon and a backslash and enclosed in quotation marks, such as C:\ or D:\. This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个或多个文件系统驱动器号，每个跟有冒号和反斜杠，用引号引起来，如 C:\ 或 d:\. 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this cmdlet to disable System Restore on a remote network drive, even if the drive is mapped to the local computer, and you cannot disable System Restore on drives that are not eligible for System Restore, such as external drives.
trans-unit.target: 无法使用此 cmdlet 在远程网络驱动器上禁用系统还原，即使该驱动器映射到本地计算机也是如此，并且无法在不符合系统还原条件的驱动器（如外部驱动器）上禁用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: To disable System Restore on any drive, System Restore must be disabled on the system drive, either before or concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 若要在任何驱动器上禁用系统还原，则必须首先或并行在系统驱动器上禁用系统还原。
-WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。
cmdlet 未运行。
CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。
输入
无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将输入传递给此 cmdlet。
输出
无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。
说明

trans-unit.source: To run this cmdlet on Windows Vistaand later versions of Windows, open Windows PowerShell with the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此 cmdlet 在 Windows Vistaand 上更高版本的 Windows 中，打开 Windows PowerShell 使用运行以管理员身份选项。

trans-unit.source: To find the file system drives that are eligible for system restore, in System in Control Panel, see the System Protection tab.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找符合系统还原条件的文件系统驱动器，请在“控制面板”中查看“系统”中的“系统保护”选项卡。

trans-unit.source: To open this tab in Windows PowerShell, type `SystemPropertiesProtection`.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows PowerShell 中打开此选项卡上，键入 `SystemPropertiesProtection`。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet uses the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) **SystemRestore** class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) **SystemRestore** 类。
相关的链接

Enable-computerrestore
Get-computerrestorepoint
